info.title: Profile statistics
info.legend:
Tradient AI is a next-generation investment platform right inside Telegram. The system uses artificial intelligence to analyze markets and automate trading, allowing you to receive stable passive income without the risk of capital loss.

You simply choose a pool, deposit assets â€” AI does the rest. Every day at 18:00 (UTC+3) you get profit, the amount depends on the selected pool and the efficiency of trading algorithms.

Everything is transparent: you can track trades and statistics in real time in the official platform chat. All withdrawals are automated. You can withdraw your deposit at any time without restrictions.
